result.execSummary:
The defendant Jessica R Leto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Jessica R Leto
parties.address: W194 S7782 Overlook Bay Unit H, Muskego, WI 53150

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Huber with standard release conditions.
Apply 11 days sentence credit, if revoked.
Court will allow for DOC to terminate probation at any point after 6 months if Agent deems appropriate.

miscConds.notes:
Cash bail applied to Court costs and DNA surcharge.  Balance to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling (court views her care giving to her elderly father as employment).
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchased, used, stored, packaged and distributed.
No presence on any premises whose primary business is serving or selling alcohol (for example, bars, taverns or liquor stores).
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
No violent contact with Joseph L.
Not to drive without a valid license.
Anger Management or Domestic Violence Counseling and follow through as deemed appropriate by Agent.

records.addlTxt:
Notice of Case Status Change - Revoked - Sentenced to Jail/HOC
  Wis. Dept. of Corrections notice of case status change received.  Outstanding financial obligations have been converted to a civil judgment.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Jessica R Leto in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.




Court orders the following:
40 Days in the Waukesha Count Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
11 Days Credit - IF REVOKED.
STAYED.

Term of Probation:  12 Months.
Court will allow DOC to terminate probation at any point after 6 months if agent deems appropriate.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
Anger Management or Domestice Violence Counseling and follow through as deemed appropriate by agent.
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling (court views her care giving to her elderly father as employment). 
No Violent contact with:  Joseph Leto.
DNA sample to be provided.
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchased, used, stored, packaged, or distributed.
No presence on any premises whose primary business is serving or selling alcohol (i.e bars, taverns, or liquor stores).
Not to drive without a valid license.

Costs:  $243
DV Surcharge:  $100
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Apply Bail.
Balance to be paid as a Condition of Probation.
Court received information from Wisconsin Community Services regarding defendant's compliance/non-compliance.

David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Jessica R Leto in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  
Defense waiting on a global offer.
File not called on the record.
  Hearing scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Court received information from Wisconsin Community Services regarding defendant's compliance/non-compliance.

Court Modifies Cash Bail to a Signature Bond in the amount of $500
Signature Bond:  $500
CONDITIONS:
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.
No Violent Contact DJL or Joseph L.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.
Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program.
Defendant to report to WCS immediately upon release.

Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Jessica R Leto in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   

Atty. Fragoso requests reduction of cash bail or a signature bond and presented arguments.
State objects and presented arguments.

Court Modifies Cash Bail to a Signature Bond in the amount of $500

CONDITIONS:

No Violent Contact DJL or Joseph L.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.
Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program.
Defendant to report to WCS immediately upon release.
Motion to Modify Bail filed by Attorney Fragoso.
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.

Defendant Jessica R Leto in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Defendant allowed one free phone call to obtain bail.  Hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
